message: What is the best place to go to for reading feature/indepth articles, other than subscribing to EGM or whatnot

Darric's Rock Band parties.

Insufficient info. What kind of features are you looking for? Articles about what?

Oops, of course, context. The type of content I enjoy most from my travels across gaming blogs are the feature length articles. Dissecting games, series, ideas, whatever. Gamasutra isn't really my scene, I prefer stuff that would appear on a Joystiq or Dtoid.

Generally the kind of features you would find in magazines, if that makes sense.
Eurogamer and nextgen.biz (EDGE's site) tend to go for longer form articles, that aren't quite as industry in-depth as, say, Gamasutra.
